filosofiaCard.subtitle: Transform from being, build from purpose and lead with soul.

journey.title: My Path: From Code to People

phases.title: From code to conversations
content: I started writing code at 3am, passionate about finding the perfect solution. PHP, MySQL, complex architectures... I always moved forward: from full-stack development to technical leadership, from Product Owner to transforming complete organizational cultures.
I never stopped. But along the way I discovered something more powerful than the perfect framework: the impact of accompanying tech people to find their purpose.

Today I no longer code in PHP or JavaScript, but I'm still the same committed innovator. Only now my code is conversations that transform teams, my deployment is helping leaders grow, and my best architecture is building cultures where people flourish.

phases.title: Real challenges aren't in the code
content: As a Tech Lead I discovered something: the best code doesn't transform if the person writing it doesn't feel connected.
Talented developers without spaces to grow. Product Owners without vision clarity. Teams without real conversations.
That's where my search began: I studied coaching, agility, facilitation, conscious leadership.
I became certified in ICF Coaching, Management 3.0, Scrum, Lean... seeking answers beyond code.

phases.title: When success isn't enough
content: At 35, I stopped. I was leading teams, important projects, recognition... but something was missing.
Nights asking myself: Am I building what really matters?
That pause was uncomfortable and necessary. It led me to professional coaching, honest conversations, to ask myself who I was without the title.
I discovered that many share this feeling. That understanding became my starting point.

phases.title: From technology to people
content: I worked 18+ years in tech (Peru, LATAM, U.S.). I led digital transformations, agile teams, scalable products.
But what gave me the most meaning were the mentoring conversations with someone seeking their path.
Seeing someone connect with their purpose in a session was worth more than any technical milestone.
Every time someone said "this conversation gave me clarity", I felt I was contributing something real.

phases.title: HugoTech: sharing what I've learned
content: HugoTech was born from a question: How to accompany without money being an obstacle?
I decided that 1-to-1 sessions would be 100% free. Not as a strategy, but as a commitment.
If today I can accompany someone, it's because others did the same for me at key moments.
This space is my way of giving back what I received and building with purpose.

evolution.title: 18+ years transforming (and being transformed)
evolution.subtitle: From writing my first line of code to leading cultural transformations in high-performance teams

phases.title: Backend Developer → Love for architecture
phases.description: I started with PHP, MySQL, MVC architectures. I built systems from scratch: e-commerce platforms, ERPs, ticketing systems for transportation. I learned that clean code isn't just syntax, it's empathy with whoever comes after.

phases.title: Frontend Developer → Experience matters (and I'm passionate about it)
phases.description: I discovered that the interface is where users feel the product. JavaScript, React, animations, performance, accessibility. It wasn't enough for it to work, it had to feel good, flow, excite. UX became my obsession: understanding every click, every microinteraction, every loading second. I fell in love with creating experiences people love to use.

phases.title: Full Stack Developer → See the complete picture + Growth
phases.description: I brought both worlds together: backend architecture + frontend experience. Now I could see the complete product, understand trade-offs, make technical decisions thinking about the business. But it wasn't enough to build well: I discovered my passion for digital marketing and growth. Analytics, conversion, funnels, A/B testing. Every line of code was an opportunity to grow the business.

phases.title: Tech Lead & Product Owner → Code isn't enough
phases.description: I led teams, defined roadmaps, negotiated with stakeholders. But here I discovered the truth: the best products are born from aligned and motivated teams. Perfect code wasn't enough if people didn't have clarity, purpose or spaces to grow.

phases.title: Country Manager → Data-Driven culture and strategic vision
phases.description: I managed operations in Peru coordinating development, marketing, call center, sales and talent management teams. I learned that success isn't just in the product, but in aligning multiple areas toward a common goal, measuring impact with KPIs and OKRs. I became obsessed with building a data-driven culture: every decision backed by data, every strategy validated with metrics. I understood that people are the most powerful strategy, and data is their best ally.

phases.title: Digital Strategist & Agile Coach → Transform people and cultures
phases.description: Today my code is conversations that transform teams. My deployment is helping leaders find their voice. My best architecture is building cultures where people flourish and talent becomes real impact. I no longer code in JavaScript, but I keep innovating: now in human development.

evolution.quote: From backend code to leading countries. From managing KPIs to transforming cultures. I'm still an innovator, only now my language is people.
evolution.author: Hugo Casanova, 18+ years of continuous evolution

mission.title: What I do today
mission.content: I accompany tech professionals in their personal and professional transformation. I offer 100% free 1-on-1 sessions for those who need them, and corporate programs that transform teams with agility, innovation and a growth mindset. From self-awareness to conscious leadership, from purpose to action with impact.

vision.title: Where I'm going
vision.content: I want to be a reference in human transformation in Latin American tech. Create a community of conscious leaders who lead with empathy, build products with purpose, and transform the industry through innovation with soul.
